QuestData.Title: The Suffering of Shen-zin Su
QuestData.Description: Now is not the time to grieve. The balloon is ready, and Shen-zin Su awaits.$B$BWe shall be the first pandaren to speak to Shen-zin Su in hundreds of years. It is a great honor.
QuestData.LogDescription: Board the Hot Air Balloon and Speak to Shen-zin Su.
QuestData.RewardText: You have undergone a great honor, $c. Have you come back wiser for it?

Objectives.Objective: Uncover the source of Shen-zin Su's pain
